name: Phillip Matambanadzo
text: I have had the privilege of working with Marcel on various projects, and his expertise as a Backend and Data Engineer is a great addition to any Team . Marcel excels in creating scalable, high-performance systems and has a remarkable ability to solve complex problems. His work with AI solutions, microservices, and container orchestration showcases his technical versatility. Beyond his technical skills, Marcel is a collaborative team player who approaches every challenge with a positive attitude and a strong commitment to clean, maintainable code. I highly recommend Marcel for any software development or data engineering project.

name: Leander Fritsche
